snippet.title: Ministry of Broadcast - Coming to Steam on January 30
snippet.description:
Ministry of Broadcast - Available January 30 on Steam

A country divided by The Wall. To cross it and reach your family, you must compete on - and win - a reality TV show broadcast by the Regime. Ministry of Broadcast is a narrative-driven single player cinematic platformer mixing Orwell’s 1984 with modern reality TV. Rife with dark humor, sarcastic quips, and a general absurdity of the system.

Seemingly built overnight, The Wall has divided both a country in two and a man from his family. To see them again, our ginger-haired protagonist has decided to become a contestant on “The Wall Show”, a Regime-organized TV show allowing competitors the opportunity to escape to freedom on the other side. However, as he progresses through the camp, our contestant soon realises exactly how the Regime and the show operate.

The promise of freedom is not exactly what it seems.

Learn more: https://ministryofbroadcast.com/
Join the community: https://discord.gg/hitcents
Stay up-to-date: https://twitter.com/hitcents
